Articles.Content:
Hey, ive looking in various types of planetpacks and other solar systems mod, such as Constellation, otherworlds, Kerbalinterstellar etc. and there is many new an interesting planets. VERY NEIZ! but there is 1 common (at my opinion) problem, and that's all stars revolve around Kerbol, i mean, that's unrealistic, cant we just have a universal planet pack addon that adds black hole that all stars revolvs around at. 

Sorry for bad english.
Galactic Neighborhood has everything revolve around a distant point mass, and it has support for a lot of the planet packs out there.

4 hours ago, IncongruousGoat said:

Galactic Neighborhood has everything revolve around a distant point mass, and it has support for a lot of the planet packs out there.

Oh, never heard it before, but very glad to know.

Phew, took me long time to find it, but let me know is that compatible with 1.2.2?

Just now, hanhan658 said:

Oh, never heard it before, but very glad to know.

Phew, took me long time to find it, but let me know is that compatible with 1.2.2?

It is, and so are all the planet packs it supports-never mind the fact that some of them don't list that compatibility. Although, it is worth noting that it's incompatible with Strategia, since that mod uses the center around which everything orbits as a reference for some strategies.
